channel.title: Client problem
channel.description: Its probably an easy fix, But I can run my .JAR file no problem at all and When my friends download it or use my webclient, It says Could not find main class Loader. Can someone please help me, It would be much appreciated :)

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Main path will be to whatever is the main class.

So if “Loader” is the main class, and it’s in org/com/jagex, the path would be
org.com.jagex.Loader

Note that Java is case sensitive. If the class starts with an uppercase L, then you need to type an uppercase L.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @Qold Qold
item.description:
@Qold wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551391”]“I jared it correctly but it doesn’t work”

I’m sorry… but if you did it correctly it would work.
Make sure you set the main path correctly, and if there’s packaging that you included that into the main path.[/quote]

Okay, What do you think I should set the main path too? Im really stumped here, I appreciate your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

“I jared it correctly but it doesn’t work”

I’m sorry… but if you did it correctly it would work.
Make sure you set the main path correctly, and if there’s packaging that you included that into the main path.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problem
item.dc:creator: @Qold Qold
item.description:
@Qold wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:2, topic:551391”]Even your title says that your post doesn’t belong here…

Sounds like a jarring issue nonetheless. However, I can’t really give you more of a solution as the information you have currently provided isn’t enough to go by.[/quote]

Okay, So i JARED my Client correctly because when I run my jared Client, It’ll work for me. But when i distripute it to my friends, they try and run it and a error come up and says “Cannot find main class Loader”. When i try to run my Webclient, It says the same thing for me too and when my friends try to run the webclient, it says the same thing.

Read full topic
